document.full_text: an egyptian court sentenced on thursday a former housing minister who served under ousted president hosni mubarak to five years in jail and fined him over an illegal land deal, a judicial source said.
document.title: egypt jails ex-housing minister for graft: source
lines_and_colors: an egyptian court sentenced on thursday a former housing minister who served under ousted president hosni mubarak to five years in jail and fined him over an illegal land deal, a judicial source said.
